2. I hope we stay clear of Waltemade because he looks like an extremely lazy version of Beto. So, sooner keep Beto.
Glad Portugal won because they were the most inventive team.

55 Posted 06/06/2025 at 06:58:51
Colin @27. Germany last won the World Cup 11 years ago. England? Their only one came nearly 60 years ago.
56 Posted 06/06/2025 at 08:05:05
Even though England are superior to Germany and have been for some time. You set a very low bar when you use them as a yardstick.
The Germans are no longer a power in in international Football. They had their day when Mechanical football ruled. Having quite possibly the greatest one touch finisher the game has ever seen helped, of course, but the game has moved on. The cream generally rises to the top these days.
While the REAL focus in England is on club football -Despite what you hear from the England fans in Stoney Stratford, Rutland and the rest of middle England. This is where England absolutely Muller's (no pun intended) It's German counterparts.
There is an awful lot to learn from other nations around the world at the moment. But nobody will learn anything from this current German generation
57 Posted 06/06/2025 at 21:01:44
Although the academy system hasn't delivered a right lot to Everton, it is now (after years of investment by other clubs) delivering the most consistent output of Champions League quality English players I've ever seen (I go back as far as Italia 90).
